p: Compounds Va–h were synthesised via the reaction of 4′-piperazino-acetophenone III and the appropriate aldehyde ( Scheme 1). The reaction of the chalcone Va, Ve, and Vf and hydrazine hydrate afforded pyrazoline derivatives VIa–c ( Scheme 2). The structures of all newly synthesised compounds were confirmed by various methods of spectroscopic analysis, such as 1H NMR, 13C NMR, IR, and mass spectrometry.
